MESSAGE: Thanks for rescuing me, Guide. You are a true hero!
WHY DID YOU FALL IN THAT?!
I'm sorry, but you can't be outside at night.
I heard there is a cave with a dragon somewhere around here...
Move over, Fortnite, Terraria is back!
